data.title: News and features about Michael cera
data.meta_description: The Latest Michael Cera Breaking News, Comment and Features from Cinemablend
data.text:
Barbie: An Updated Cast List, Including Margot Robbie, Ryan Gosling And More

The Barbie movie brought an absolutely top-notch cast to a movie about a toy.

Michael Cera Had A Deleted Scene In Barbie That Was Inspired By Jaws, And I Feel Like We Were Robbed

One Barbie standout, Michael Cera's Allan, apparently had a hilarious scene that referenced Jaws, per cinematographer Rodrigo Prieto.

Michael Cera Responded To The Scott Pilgrim Email Chain 9 Years Late, And It Had A Sweet Result

The star of 2010's Scott Pilgrim vs. the World had a funny way of getting the cast reconnected ahead of the upcoming Netflix series.

Dream Scenario Premiered At TIFF, See What People Are Saying About Nicolas Cage's Upcoming A24 Dark Comedy

Dream Scenario premiered at Toronto International Film Festival. See what people are saying about the A24 comedy starring Nicolas Cage.

I Rewatched Superbad, And There Are Two Things I Hate About It, But Also Some Delightful Silver Linings

I gave Superbad a second chance, and there are still elements I hate about it, but there are some delightful silver linings.

Scott Pilgrim’s Michael Cera Explains Why He Got Depressed After Wrapping

Michael Cera admitted he was depressed after finally finishing Scott Pilgrim Vs. The World.

12 Actors You Forgot Were On Veronica Mars

These Veronica Mars actors are now some of the biggest names in Hollywood. See which actors appeared on the show long before they were famous.

Michael Cera Says His Manager Nearly Cost Him The Barbie Movie's Allan Role

Michael Cera almost wasn't Allan in the Barbie movie for a couple of different reasons.

Barbie: 7 Sublime Details I Noticed After Watching Margot Robbie's Movie A Second Time

There are seven sublime details I noticed after seeing Margot Robbie's Barbie in theaters a second time.

SNL Darling Bowen Yang And A Slew Of Other Names Were All Asked To Bring Ken-Ergy To Barbie (And Allan Almost Wasn’t Played By Michael Cera!)

Barbie's cast is arguably perfect as is, but it turns out SNL's Bowen Yang and more were nearly part of the fun, while Michael Cera nearly wasn't.
